segments.text: I need to pay the fine on my ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have the ticket with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have my ticket with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I forgot to bring that with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need it to pay your fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why can't I just give you the money for the fine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because , I need to see a photo ID in order to verify who you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , come back and bring your ID .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So once I pay this off , my record will be cleared ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Once you pay it , your record will be cleared .
segments.speaker: S2
